Posted By: O0oze (11/4/2013 11:02:23 AM)

posts.post_content: In regards to the comments about Dark Ritual being the highest rated card in Mercadian Masques: This may be the most popular card in this set, but the most \*powerful\* card in that set was probably [Rishadan Port](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Rishadan Port). The most overlooked card was probably [Misdirection](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Misdirection), AKA "the other [Force of Will](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Force of Will)" that should never have made it past playtesting because it makes blue impossible to play against without lots of luck on your side.
posts.html:
In regards to the comments about Dark Ritual being the highest rated card in Mercadian Masques: This may be the most popular card in this set, but the most *powerful* card in that set was probably Rishadan Port. The most overlooked card was probably Misdirection, AKA "the other Force of Will" that should never have made it past playtesting because it makes blue impossible to play against without lots of luck on your side.
